title: Looking for a duo partner to practice with in pre-season then climb next year :)
body: As the title says :) would be preferable if you're not psycho XD plat is just my minimum goal for next year, i'm currently silver 5, should be 4 if my next game goes well, i can play every role well, strongest top/supp weakest being adc, i'd also like to use curse/skype so a mic would be helpful but not crucial =]

replies.body: Ill duo with you dude.  Add me, Got a team of casuals I game with and a mumble server, But play solo que alone.

Yeah ...im keen too... silver 4 currently . If more people are keen to join, get a team and Ill join that too. Have skype. I can play anyrole but adc too.

here's a {{item:2009}}
Ill see what i can sort out mate, added in the meantime :)
I'll help you. I'm a gold IV Kat and Yi main. Add me if you want.
added mate, the kat main is real haha :)
